textBox.richText: Paul is working with the Design Council as a Design Associate to help redesign the pharmacy and its services at Whittingdon Hospital in north London. Helping to transform public services through expert mentoring. The programme helps service leaders and frontline teams meet service delivery challenges. Design Associates are strategic design advisors with experience of mentoring in both the public and private sector. They will help you use design to ensure priority services are more effective and efficient and meet the needs of local people. Read More
